extendedInfo.description: Refilling beer mug with sparklesWallpaper setting sizes are now available for the following resolutions:600x1024 (Tablet size) 480x854, 480x800, 480x600, 320x480, 240x320Sizes 480x750 480x700 are also included for added adjustments.Choose frames per second for the wallpaper speed 1-20Now save this wallpaper to your SD Card!
